data.introduce:
重出票是在线分销平台上的一个提供客票重出：ETRY的服务功能。  
各种原因（比如系统传输等）导致无出票成功提示或者出现“ELECTRONIC TICKET TRANSACTION TIMEOUT”,时，调用此服务。
data.business: 支持由于各种原因（比如系统传输等）导致无出票成功提示或者出现“ELECTRONIC TICKET TRANSACTION TIMEOUT”时，调用此服务进行重新出票操作。
data.functions:
本版本支持的重出票业务场景如下：
1. 由于各种原因（比如系统传输等）导致无出票成功提示，可以使用该服务进行重出票操作。
2. 出现“ELECTRONIC TICKET TRANSACTION TIMEOUT”，导致出票没成功，可以使用该服务进行重出票操作。
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"OTA_AirTicketRetryRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空重新出票请求信息","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Point Of Sale","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"资源信息","children":[{"name":"@PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Office号：预定Office号，必输项","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"TicketRetryDetail","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"重出票信息项","children":[{"name":"BookingReferenceID","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"@ID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"订单号或PNR号","children":[]},{"name":"@ID_Context","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"类型，“Order”或“PNR”","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"@ReturnTicketInfoInd","type":"boolean","quantity":"0..1","default":"false","description":"是否返回票面信息","children":[]},{"name":"@TicketType","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"票证类型：BSP,AL","children":[]}]}]
data.responseSchema: [{"name":"OTA_AirTicketRetryRS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"航空重新出票响应信息","children":[{"name":"Success","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"成功标志Success","children":[]},{"name":"Warnings","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告信息集合","children":[{"name":"Warning","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告代码(数字)","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告描述信息(英文)","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortTextZH","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告描述信息(中文)","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"RetryDetail","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"重出票详细信息","children":[{"name":"TicketInfo","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"客票信息","children":[{"name":"BookingReferenceID","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"@ID","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"PNR号","children":[]},{"name":"@ID_Context","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"PNR","children":[]}]},{"name":"TicketItemInfo","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"显示票面信息","children":[{"name":"PassengerName","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"旅客信息：旅客信息","children":[{"name":"Surname","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"旅客姓名","children":[]},{"name":"@PassengerTypeCode","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"旅客类型","children":[]}]},{"name":"FlightSegment","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"航段信息：航段信息","children":[{"name":"DepartureAirport","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"出发机场信息","children":[{"name":"@LocationCode","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"机场代码","children":[]}]},{"name":"ArrivalAirport","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"到达机场信息","children":[{"name":"@LocationCode","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"机场代码（例如：SHA）","children":[]}]},{"name":"MarketingAirline","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"市场方航空公司信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"航空公司代码（例如：CA）","children":[]}]},{"name":"Baggage","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"行李信息","children":[{"name":"@BaggageWeight","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"允许携带的行李重量(KG)","children":[]},{"name":"@BaggagePiece","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"允许携带的行李件数(PC)","children":[]}]},{"name":"@DepartureDateTime","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"出发日期和时间","children":[]},{"name":"@FlightNumber","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"市场方航班号","children":[]},{"name":"@TicketStatus","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"票证状态","children":[]},{"name":"@ResBookDesigCode","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"舱位","children":[]},{"name":"@SegmentStatus","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"航段状态","children":[]}]},{"name":"@TicketNumber","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"票号","children":[]},{"name":"@TotalAmount","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"票面总金额","children":[]},{"name":"@CurrencyCode","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"货币代码","children":[]},{"name":"@PaymentType","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"支付方式","children":[]},{"name":"@Endorsement","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"签注信息","children":[]},{"name":"@Remark","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"票号备注","children":[]},{"name":"@IssueAirline","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"出票航空公司","children":[]},{"name":"@ETicketType","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"电子客票类型","children":[]},{"name":"@OrgCity","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"始发城市","children":[]},{"name":"@DstCity","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"终点城市","children":[]},{"name":"@Tax","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"税款金额","children":[]}]}]}]},{"name":"Errors","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"？错误信息","children":[{"name":"Error","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"？","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"航空公司代码","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"警告类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误详细信息","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortTextZH","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误描述信息(中文)","children":[]}]}]}]}]
data.errorCodes: [{"code":" 403 ","name":null,"msg":null,"msgZh":" 用户名、密码、IP错误或无权限 "},{"code":" -303 ","name":null,"msg":" inner service error ","msgZh":" 内部服务异常 "},{"code":" -301 ","name":null,"msg":" office prermission denied ","msgZh":" 没有office权限 "},{"code":" -780 ","name":null,"msg":" printer number is not valid ","msgZh":" 打印机号错误 "},{"code":" -760 ","name":null,"msg":" format of pnr locator is not valid ","msgZh":" pnr号格式错误 "},{"code":" -51301 ","name":null,"msg":" fail to retry to demand ticket ","msgZh":" 客票重出失败 "}]
